title: Yurumates
opening_song: "Loosey Goosey (るーじー・ぐーじー)" by Halko Momoi
ending_song: "Loosey Goosey (るーじー・ぐーじー)" by Momoi Haruko
sinopse: Yurume, an 18-year old "ronin" and recent high school graduate, has high hopes of being accepted and attending Tokyo University. She moves into an apartment complex, the Maison du Wish, located on the outskirts of Tokyo where other ronins living there are studying for upcoming college acceptance exams.
